title: PES cutoff through PESSAT
content: Whats the cutoff for CSE in 1st round and last round RR campus for 2023? The cutoff for 2022-23 is posted in the megathread but what was the cutoff for last year?

comments.body:
Before kcet admissions got over or before
I would be glad if someone leaks cutoff for this year lol
Afaik, cutoffs depend on the last year's last person joining rank i believe, so you'd basically have to ask everyone who joined via KCET their ranks ðŸ’€
Nah its the other way around  the cutoff decides the last person who joins
For PESSAT the "cutoff" is the rank of the last person who joined. AFAIK it should be the same for KCET too.
guys apparently thereâ€™s a negative marking of 0.25 in PESSAT for BTECH paper. Can someone confirm if this is real
When are results going to come?
How much PESSAT rank one can expect with 127 score? Have considered the negative marking.
yes, it was mentioned in PES website
Can I get ece in ec campus at 6067 rank? Atleast in the second round considering there was negative marking this year
i have gotten 60XX rank as well, i want to know if ill get EEE at RR campus.
